{"id":1077111564,"question_id":2,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"8 months, 1 week","timestamp":1697504164,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"20 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1077111564/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"71.8 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * struct ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode *next;\n *     ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    ListNode* addTwoNumbers(ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2) {\n        ListNode* res = new ListNode();\n        ListNode* cur = res;\n        int sum = 0, carry = 0;\n        while(l1 && l2){\n            sum = carry;\n            sum+=l1->val;\n            l1 = l1->next;\n            sum+=l2->val;\n            l2 = l2->next;\n\n            cur->next = new ListNode(sum%10);\n            carry= sum/10;\n            cur = cur->next;\n        }\n\n        while(l1){\n            sum = carry;\n            sum+=l1->val;\n            cur->next = new ListNode(sum%10);\n            carry= sum/10;\n            cur = cur->next;\n            l1 = l1->next;\n        }\n\n        while(l2){\n            sum = carry;\n            sum+=l2->val;\n            cur->next = new ListNode(sum%10);\n            carry= sum/10;\n            cur = cur->next;\n            l2 = l2->next;\n        }\n\n        if(carry){\n            cur->next = new ListNode(1);\n        }\n        return res->next;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
